description: Complete asset manifest for PrivateBox offline recovery and factory provisioning

container_images.description: Container images required for all services. Pull from registry and save as .tar files.

base_images.name: portainer
base_images.command: podman pull docker.io/portainer/portainer-ce:latest && podman save -o portainer-ce-latest.tar docker.io/portainer/portainer-ce:latest

base_images.name: adguard
base_images.command: podman pull docker.io/adguard/adguardhome:latest && podman save -o adguard-home-latest.tar docker.io/adguard/adguardhome:latest

base_images.name: homer
base_images.command: podman pull docker.io/b4bz/homer:latest && podman save -o homer-latest.tar docker.io/b4bz/homer:latest

base_images.name: headscale
base_images.command: podman pull docker.io/headscale/headscale:latest && podman save -o headscale-latest.tar docker.io/headscale/headscale:latest

base_images.name: headplane
base_images.command: podman pull ghcr.io/tale/headplane:latest && podman save -o headplane-latest.tar ghcr.io/tale/headplane:latest

base_images.name: semaphore-base

download_script.description: Use this command to download all required assets
download_script.script:
#!/bin/bash

# PrivateBox Asset Download Script
# Downloads all assets listed in this manifest

set -e

MKDIR_CMD='mkdir -p assets/{containers,images,templates,source,installer}'

echo 'Downloading container base images...'
podman pull docker.io/portainer/portainer-ce:latest
podman pull docker.io/adguard/adguardhome:latest
podman pull docker.io/b4bz/homer:latest
podman pull docker.io/headscale/headscale:latest
podman pull ghcr.io/tale/headplane:latest
podman pull docker.io/semaphoreui/semaphore:latest
podman pull docker.io/caddy:2-alpine

echo 'Saving container images as tar files...'
podman save -o assets/containers/portainer-ce-latest.tar docker.io/portainer/portainer-ce:latest
podman save -o assets/containers/adguard-home-latest.tar docker.io/adguard/adguardhome:latest
podman save -o assets/containers/homer-latest.tar docker.io/b4bz/homer:latest
podman save -o assets/containers/headscale-latest.tar docker.io/headscale/headscale:latest
podman save -o assets/containers/headplane-latest.tar ghcr.io/tale/headplane:latest
podman save -o assets/containers/semaphore-base-latest.tar docker.io/semaphoreui/semaphore:latest
podman save -o assets/containers/caddy-base-2-alpine.tar docker.io/caddy:2-alpine

echo 'Downloading VM images...'
wget -O assets/images/debian-13-genericcloud-amd64.qcow2 https://cloud.debian.org/images/cloud/trixie/latest/debian-13-genericcloud-amd64.qcow2
wget -O assets/templates/vzdump-qemu-105-opnsense.vma.zst https://github.com/Rasped/privatebox/releases/download/v1.0.2-opnsense/vzdump-qemu-105-opnsense.vma.zst

echo 'Downloading source code...'
wget -O assets/source/privatebox-main.tar.gz https://github.com/Rasped/privatebox/archive/refs/heads/main.tar.gz

echo 'Complete! All assets downloaded to ./assets/'
echo 'Total size estimate: ~3.5GB'

asset_structure.description: Recommended directory structure for offline asset storage

notes: All container images use 'latest' tag for initial implementation
Future versions should pin specific versions for reproducibility
Custom builds (Semaphore, Caddy) are built on-device from base images
Recovery and installer components marked 'future' are not yet implemented
OPNsense template is stored on GitHub releases due to size (767MB)
Checksums should be added for all files before production use
